requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or better
  • Memory: 250 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 support
  • Storage: 70 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Most modern PCs will work
